attributes.action: Stop immigration until unemployment level falls to 2%
attributes.additional_details:
The government declares that it has a high priority in getting the unemployed back to work and off Welfare.  there are about two and a half million unemployed in the country and also two and a half million migrants.

Stop migration, including from the EU until the present high average of at least 10% unemployment figure falls to 2%.

You will be able to get people off Welfare when there are jobs available.
